think_procedure: Identify the purpose of the 'random_page_cost' knob in PostgreSQL.
The 'random_page_cost' knob is used to set the cost estimation for reading a random page from disk.
Check if there are any special values for 'random_page_cost' that change its behavior beyond the regular numerical range.
Review PostgreSQL documentation or resources to identify if there are any special values like -1 or 0 that disable or significantly alter its function.
Determine if the knob has a special value that changes its behavior compared to its regular numerical operation.
